bibl.title: Fontes Historiae Nubiorum. Textual Sources for the History of the Middle Nile Region between the Eighth Century BC and the Sixth Century AD. Vol. I: From the Eighth Century to the Mid-Fifth Century BC.
bibl.note: Presents the main textual sources, both literary and documentary. Text, translation and historical commentary.
bibl.seg: EIDE Tormod, Tomas HÄGG, Richard Holton PIERCE and László TÖRÖK, Fontes Historiae Nubiorum. Textual Sources for the History of the Middle Nile Region between the Eighth Century BC and the Sixth Century AD. Vol. I: From the Eighth Century to the Mid-Fifth Century BC.
Presents the main textual sources, both literary and documentary. Text, translation and historical commentary.
C.R. par Herman De Meulenaere, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 147, pp. 89-90 [concerne aussi: vol. II, 1996].
